# Transnational Digital Creation Workshop 2025

## Participants

### Laura Shackelford - lxsgla
Laura Shackelford is a professor at the Rochester Institute of Technology, specializing in digital humanities and transnational studies. Her work focuses on the intersection of technology, culture, and creative practices.

### Samuel Szoniecky - samszo
Samuel Szoniecky is a researcher at the Laboratoire Paragraphe, Université Paris 8. His expertise lies in digital creation, collaborative platforms, and the development of innovative tools for transdisciplinary research.
